snippet.title: Gilded Shadows Teaser
snippet.description:
Gilded Shadows will be a full-length visual novel that explores a whimsical, yet dangerous world which blends the solarpunk and cyberpunk aesthetics into a unique adventure. The player can explore different factions and story lines based on their choices in the common route.

The final game is planned to contain 25-30 hours of content where your personality traits lock or unlock various interactions and responses to situations. As you follow the MC on her journey, pursue one of six love interests in a stand-alone story unique to that route.


https://steamberry.itch.io/gilded-shadows
